sentences.en: Containerization is popular in international movement.
sentences.cn: 集装箱化在国际运输中甚受欢迎.

sentences.en: Containerization is regarded as a mode for more efficient shipment.
sentences.cn: 集装箱化被认为是一种效率高的运货方式.

sentences.en: Containerization is regarded as a mode of more efficient shipment.
sentences.cn: 集装箱化被认为是一种高效率的货运方式.

sentences.en: Containerization is regarded as a model for abundance efficient shipment.
sentences.cn: 集装箱化被以为是一种效率更高的运货办法.

sentences.en: Containerization is regarded as a model for more efficient shipment.
sentences.cn: 集装箱化被认为是一种效率更高的运货方式.

sentences.en: Firstly, transportation by means of containerization had become prevalent in sea transportation.
sentences.cn: 首先, 货柜运输在航海运输中变成通行的方式.

sentences.en: Furthermore, containerization integrates all process, such as packaging, and unloading, transporting between locations, storage and distribution.
sentences.cn: 此外, 货柜运输充斥着整个流程, 例如包装 、 装卸 、 运输 、 存储和配送.

sentences.en: I think containerization be one of the best transportation method at present.
sentences.cn: 我认为集装箱化是当前的最佳运输方法之一.

sentences.en: I think containerization is one of the best loading methods at present.
sentences.cn: 我认为集装箱运输是目前最佳运输方法之一.

sentences.en: I think that containerization is one of the best transportation methods at present.
sentences.cn: 我认为是集装箱化是当前的最佳运输方法这一。
现代物流采用了集装技术.

sentences.en: Of course the shipment of goods has been changed by the technique of containerization.
sentences.cn: 当然货物装运随集装箱运输技术而改变.

sentences.en: The containerization of railway freightage is an important means of enhancing the efficiency of railway transportation.
sentences.cn: 铁路货物运输的集装箱化是提高铁路运输效率的重要手段。

sentences.en: The growth of containerization has resulted in changes in transport patterns and practices.
sentences.cn: 集装箱化的增长导致了运输方式和实际惯例的改变。

sentences.en: There's no doubt that the shipment of goods have been improved by the technique of containerization.
sentences.cn: 由于采用集装箱技术,货物运输无疑已得到改进.
